Posts.Content: Dec 27, 2015 03:08PM babyduck wrote: I had to have one treatment of THP then dropped the taxotere. Lost hair. Well not all. But it was soooo mangy. Some places gone some areas long. So had it cut to about an inch. Feels and looks better. I'm on JUst H&P now. Maybe some will grow back. Question to you all.....do you move tteatment up a week ever? I've done it a few times for different needs. Scared to do it too much but wanting to this week for vacation....just wanted your thoughts.

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2014 04:22PM babyduck wrote: woody... the SIR spheres was recommended because I had more than two lesions. Two that were noticeable and small ones throughout. So we set it up before my ct. However the report from the radiologist gives on ct is only talking about one. I just got the report today and haven't spoken to oncologist. Also I had a second opinion at Sloan Kettering in New York and the oncologist there recommended SIR spheres too. The two now confirm with each other on my treatments so I'll go with it....Praying your scans are GREAT.
